channel.title: Pk point shop
channel.description: Okay im having this issue with my server's pk point shop it will not let me buy anything out of it even tho I had gave myself enough pk points to buy an item from the store..... its only letting me sell stuff to it and get cash like u see below. I'm pretty positive it has something to do with the shops ID but im not sure what to set the npc's ID to inside of shopassiasnt.java and I don't know this npc's ID so its a little hard to find.

item.title: Pk point shop
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

Buy and sell both, I know what you mean it had the number 2. Which means sell/buy so I changed it to 1 for just buy but still nothing I can show you my pk shop stuff.

basically the first part in shop.cfg
Points_Shop 1 1
shop = 30 Pk_Points_Shop_2 1 1
then this below is in a text document called shops or maybe (shops.java)?
then the attachment is my shopassitance.java

Read full topic

item.title: Pk point shop
item.description:
@300 wrote:

In your shops.cfg are you able to buy/sell or just sell?

Read full topic

item.title: Pk point shop
item.dc:creator: @sbruinsma77 sbruinsma77
item.description:
@sbruinsma77 wrote:

just go stand in the shop look for spawn-config search the same coords and then you will find the npc id
